name: Okappy
description:
Okappy is an innovative B2B workforce management solution rethinking the way businesses manage their day-to-day work. 

It applies social and market networking technology to a real business need – the need for communication and collaboration when working with employees at different locations, multiple sub-contractors and multiple clients.  

By leveraging Okappy's growing market network, information flows freely from order maker through to the end engineer so duplication is eradicated, costs and capacity are reduced , and ultimately turnover are increased.  

It streamlines processes, reduces paperwork and increases efficiency, making a significant difference to bottom-line profits, and gives the business owner complete control of every job, every step of the way.  

From any electronic device with an internet connection, businesses can leverage Okappy to manage their workflow, giving them back their time and mobility.

jobs.title: Full stack software developer
jobs.description:
£35,000 - £50,000 | Shoreditch

Okappy is an exciting new B2B collaboration and communications platform which re-thinks the way companies manage their day-to-day work.  It applies social and market network technology to a real business need, the need to communicate and collaborate with lots of employees, multiple subcontractors, across different sites and with different clients. 

We are looking for an exceptional Full Stack Developer to join our growing development team. This is a fantastic opportunity to work within a small passionate team based in the heart of Shoreditch, East London and have a big impact on how the company, platform and technology grows.

We offer a flexible, fun and exciting work environment with great opportunities. Your primary focus will be helping design and develop the Okappy platform by building new features, enhancing the existing code base, bug fixing and expanding automated testing.

Required Skills

- Excellent understanding of Javascript ES6 and CSS
- Excellent understanding of Java & MySQL
- Knowledge of systems architecture and web technologies
- Experience of building scalable, distributed and real-time platforms
- Experience deploying to AWS cloud infrastructure
- Ability to review proposals, designs and specifications to ensure they are implementable, proposing suitable alternatives if necessary
- Experience working within development pipelines and continuous integration/delivery
- Experience working with TDD/BDD using Cucumber
- Good knowledge of Git
- Excellent communication skills

Bonus Skills

- Experience working with Wordpress and Joomla
- Experience with Google Maps, Datatables and Fullcalendar
- Experience with Node JS, PHP 7, React and React Native
- Mobile technologies; Swift, Objective C and Javascript/Cordova

Attitude

- Always learning new technologies and looking to advance your skills
- You play well with others and see the benefit of good communicate
- You love working in a small team and wearing multiple hats
- You get stuff done, but you also care about the quality of your work
- Understand that sometimes you need to work late and under pressure

We like to deal directly with our candidates so no recruiters please.

jobs.title: Lead UI Designer
jobs.description:
Okappy is an innovative B2B communications and collaborations platform which is re-thinking how companies manage their day-to-day work.  It applies social and market network technology to a real business need, the need to communicate and collaborate with lots of employees, multiple subcontractors, across different sites and with different clients.

We're growing quickly and have successfully completed our second funding round.  We are now looking to expand the team including a UI designer to lead the design and development of our platform.

Ideally you will be proficient in Photoshop and illustrator with the ability to freehand sketch for storyboarding.  You will be working within a small close knit team including a front end and full stack developer.  You will have responsibility for all aspects of the platform including our web portal and mobile apps.

Its an exciting role, market networks are expected to be the future of software and we are at the forefront and already seeing growth of 20% month on month.

If you have a strong sense of design and customer experience.  If you are enthusiastic and ambitious.  And if you are keen to grow and develop with us, then get in touch.

jobs.title: Pre sales
jobs.description:
This position offers a unique opportunity for those who are interested in starting or accelerating a sales career at Okappy. Our program provides ongoing sales training, career development, and offers lots of opportunity for growth. As a Sales Developer you will develop and build sales leads across the country. This includes web based and phone based research as well as making outbound calls to book sales appointments.

We are seeking candidates who are self-starters with a strong work ethic and drive to succeed. The ideal candidate is tech-savvy, loves to help others, and is passionate.

Responsibilities are to

- Contact the Okappy professional community via phone, email or instant message
- Educate customers on how to get the most from the Okappy platform
- Assist the sales and marketing team to generate content, ideas and leads
- Maintain contact with professionals to help them get the most out of Okappy
- Provide user feedback to the marketing and sales teams

jobs.title: Junior Account Manager
jobs.description:
We are living through a revolution; the very structure of the economy is changing as we move from large companies trying to do everything, often badly to a collaboration of companies working together to offer the best products and services.

This requires a radical re-think in how work is managed and frankly the existing workforce management applications are not up to the task. Okappy is an innovative B2B workforce management platform, which utilises social and market networking technology to fulfil a real business need. The need to communicate and collaborate when working with lots of employees, multiple subcontractors, across different sites and with different employees.

Description:

We are looking for a junior account manager to help build long-term relationships with our customers and prospects, provide help and support and ensure our customers get the most from Okappy's innovative new platform.  

What will you be doing?

You’ll be working as part of a small, dynamic team managing and responding to client and business requests.  You'll be using a suite of software including our own internal systems to solve a broad range of client issues.

The role will involve talking to existing, and potential, clients each day.  You'll be helping them with their enquiries and supporting them through the on-boarding process in order to ensure the ongoing success of our relationship. 

You may be required to travel on occasion to represent the company at trade shows and conferences and help with training days.

This is an exciting role for someone who enjoys speaking to people, is creative and enjoys problem solving.  We are looking for someone who can bring passion and drive to the role and go above and beyond what a client might expect. 

You will need to develop in depth expertise in our solution and understand how it can be best applied to solve a clients issues, and ultimately help them build and grow their own businesses!

Other tasks

Maintain and track KPIs

Work closely with the product team and sales

Marketing, writing content, improving our on-site SEO and obtaining back-links.

Growth Hacking, focusing on reaching as many people as possible and getting them on the platform.

jobs.title: Junior Growth Hacker
jobs.description:
Junior Growth Hacker required for exciting new market network.  Have you got what it takes?

‪We are living through a revolution; the very structure of the economy is changing as we move from large companies trying to do everything, often badly to a collaboration of companies working together to offer the best products and services.

This requires a radical re-think in how work is managed and frankly the existing workforce management applications are not up to the task.  Okappy is an innovative B2B workforce management platform, which utilises social and market networking technology to fulfil a real business need.  The need to communicate and collaborate when working with lots of employees, multiple subcontractors, across different sites and with different employees.

Description:

We are looking for a junior growth hacker to generate leads and drive usage of our innovative new workforce management platform.  

What will you be doing?

- Scaling and Automating the growth processes
- Choosing which metrics/KPIs (Key Performance Indicators) to focus on
- Bringing traditional and creative ideas how to grow those KPIs
- A/B testing those ideas
- Analysing the data and users’ feedback
- Exchanging ideas/data/feedback with product development in order to make the product more user-centric
- Driving traffic to our website, landing pages, social media, apps… 
- Working on a lean startup process
- Working with the AARRR Sales Metrics Diagram (Acquisition – Activation – Retention – Referral - Revenue) 
- Prioritise and optimise our growth channels

jobs.title: Data analyst
jobs.description:
We are looking for a data analyst to help us continue our development as well as extend and scale our platform.

As a data analyst you will collect, organise and study data to provide business insight. You’ll cleanse, extract and aggregate data from client systems, conduct a range of analysis, and present insights to colleagues and clients. You will support delivery of our analytics to clients, and help us improve our core platform.
